biography_text: ESTES, Ron, a Representative from Kansas; born in Topeka, Shawnee County, Kans., July 19, 1956; graduated from Union City High School, Union City, Tenn.; B.A., Tennessee Technological University, Cookeville, Tenn.; M.B.A., Tennessee Technological University, Cookeville, Tenn.; businessman; farmer; Sedgwick County, Kans., treasurer, 2004-2010; Kansas state treasurer, 2010-2017; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Fifteenth and succeeding Congress (April 11, 2017-present).
